data.title: Early Round B Main Haunt from Mid Boiler
data.description: Here's a great early round Haunt, that you must set up in the pre-round, to check for players in B Main and close Mid Blue.

data.title: Early Round Haunt to Stop Mid Lurk / Push from Boiler
data.description: Here's a great early round Haunt to stop enemy players from pushing or lurking into Mid at the beginning of the round.
